prompts: Create a cute fairy-type Pokemon with bright yellow colors and playful features.
I want a small, egg-shaped Pokemon that looks friendly and inviting.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon with a unique shell design and cheerful expression.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a tiny creature with bright colors and star-like features.

Design a Pokemon that appears to be a baby creature with a soft, rounded body.
Show me a Pokemon that has a playful personality and a charming visual appearance.
